pages.text: $(item)Logistics Drones/$ are a special type of $(l:tools/drones)drone/$. They are a lower tier $(thing)Drone/$, since they are not programmable but limited to carrying out $(italic)only/$ logistics tasks.

pages.title: 自動充氣
pages.text: As with all types of Drone, these drones require $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ to operate, and will automatically seek out $(l:tools/drone#charging)a Charging Station with a Dispenser Upgrade/$ if low on air.

放置後，$(item)物流無人機/$將會裝有$(l:logistics/frames)物流框架/$的容器或儲罐執行物流操作，範圍大小為 33*33*33（立方體），以最初所放置處為中心。$(p)由於這類無人機需要頻繁移動物品，建議安裝$(l:base_concepts/upgrades#speed)速度/$和$(l:base_concepts/upgrades#inventory)物品欄/$升級，以提升移動速度和承載容量。
